<template>
  <id class="app">
    <router-view></router-view>
  </id>
</template>

<script>
import main from './components/Main.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components:{main,},
  setup(){
      
    // 定义全局rem
    document.querySelector("html").style.fontSize=document.documentElement.clientWidth/3+'px';
    console.log("现在rem的大小",document.querySelector("html").style.fontSize);

  }
}
</script>

<style lang="less">
  html{
    
  }
  body{
    margin: 0;
    font-size:20px;
  }

</style>
